mapper.insert: INSERT INTO video ( video_name, video_link, running_minute, running_second, all_second, start_day, end_day, reg_dt, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{videoName}, #{videoLink}, #{runningMinute}, #{runningSecond}, #{allSecond}, #{videoStartDay}, #{videoEndDay}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE video SET video_name = #{videoName}, video_link = #{videoLink}, running_minute = #{runningMinute}, running_second = #{runningSecond}, all_second = #{allSecond}, start_day = #{videoStartDay}, end_day = #{videoEndDay}, mod_dt = now() WHERE idx = #{videoIdx}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO application ( type, name, count, start_day, end_day, reg_dt, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{applicationType}, #{applicationName}, #{applicationCount}, #{applicationStartDay}, #{applicationEndDay}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: UPDATE application SET name = #{applicationName}, count = #{applicationCount}, start_day = #{applicationStartDay}, end_day = #{applicationEndDay}, mod_dt = now() WHERE idx = #{applicationIdx} AND type = #{applicationType}
